participant_1.background:
I am not close to my family because they do not understand my passion for music.
i am a bank teller.
i m very religious.
i am a carefree , funloving , free spirited person.
i commute by bus.

participant_2.background:
I bought a new monitor because my old one was too small.
I wish my dog could come with me on all my travels.
I celebrate my birthday in a way that is not weather dependent.
I'm planning to work on my model car project and go to a baseball game.
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.

content.text: I'm a bank teller. I commute by bus.
I have a new monitor because my old one was too small.
I'm not close to my family because they don't understand my passion for music.
I wish my dog could come with me on all my travels.
I celebrate my birthday in a way that is not weather dependent.
I'm a carefree, funloving, free spirited person.
I'm planning to work on my model car project and go to a baseball game.
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.
That sounds like fun! I like the idea of being carefree and funloving
